title: American Horror Story 8: Apocalypse // Promo #4
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: I have no idea what the plot of this season will be like but it seems to be an interesting idea to link Murder House and Coven with the apocalypse.
Yasssss bring on the apocalypse ! I can’t wait for this season. I hope it lives up to it’s hype!
Can't wait for this. Looks so good :)
